Trust Company Supervisor at Horton Trust Company LLC

Charlotte is both a creative and a diligent thinker.  I assigned her to create a financial analysis package of business activities that had never been subject to this before.  The managers who had responsibility for the activities were suspicious or hostile.  Charlotte devised strategies to obtain important data and then to analyze them in order to inform decision-making that sometimes resulted in significant change.  Charlotte does not hesitate to express her opinions and support them with well-reasoned arguments.  Even at a very early stage in her professional career, she added significant value to our operations.

summary: Mr. Goulka is the Managing Director of Arizona Tech Investors, a group over 80 men and women who invest their own capital in early stage technology companies in the Southwest.  Since May 2007, members have invested just over $12.25 million in 43 companies, making it the most active early stage technology investor in Phoenix.  In addition to his role at ATI, Mr. Goulka serves as CEO and President of Lone Mountain Associates, LLC, a boutique consulting firm.  He previously served as CEO of software companies JumpStart Solutions LLC, an early stage business intelligence software company, NetSelector Inc (sold to Apple, Inc), and bid4real.com; the National Technology Transfer Center; the Frank Lloyd Wright Foundation and Taliesin Preservation, Inc.  He was also COO and CFO of Encyclopaedia Britannica Inc and its worldwide subsidiaries, where he led its transformation into digital publishing.  He began his career in corporate finance, focused on financing private equity transactions and global finance at units of JPMorgan Chase and Citibank.
name: James Goulka
title: Managing Director at Arizona Tech Investors
